meanings.definition: Made up of a variety of colors or elements
meanings.sent1: The clown wore a motley outfit with bright colors and patterns.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with motley flowers of different shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The motley painting looked like a rainbow exploded on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her motley personality shone through in her eclectic taste in music.
meanings.sent5: The motley quilt was a patchwork of memories and fabrics.

meanings.sent1: The motley group of friends included people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent2: Her motley wardrobe reflected her ever-changing style and mood.
meanings.sent3: The motley cast of characters in the play kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent4: His motley collection of books ranged from fantasy to science fiction.
meanings.sent5: The motley crowd at the concert danced together in harmony.

meanings.sent1: The soup was a motley of vegetables, herbs, and spices.
meanings.sent2: The marketplace was a motley of sounds, smells, and colors.
meanings.sent3: The motley of emotions on her face showed her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent4: His room was a motley of toys, books, and art supplies.
meanings.sent5: The motley of flavors in the dish created a culinary masterpiece.
